TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MaskedTextProvider extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 表示可由支持掩码的任何数量的控件（如 控件）使用的掩码分析服务。

span.span: Represents a mask-parsing service that can be used by any number of controls that support masking, such as the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件包含由文本字符和格式设置元素组成的掩码，它对所有用户输入进行测试。The control contains a mask, composed of literal characters and formatting elements, that it tests all user input against. Windows 窗体将特定掩码分析引擎与 永久关联，而不是将其作为单独的服务提供，该服务由 类表示，后者定义在文档中讨论的掩码语言的语法 属性。Instead of permanently associating a specific mask-parsing engine with , Windows Forms provides it as a separate service, represented by the class, which defines the syntax of the masking language discussed in the documentation for the property. 类的许多成员将其实现方式称为关联的 的与命名相同的成员。Many of the members of the class refer their implementation to similarly named members of the associated . 例如， 类的 属性引用对 类的 的所有访问。For example, the property of the class refers all access to the of the class. 所使用的掩码分析引擎在 Microsoft Visual Basic 版本6中包含的掩码编辑控件之后建模。The mask-parsing engine used by is modeled after the Masked Edit control included in Microsoft Visual Basic version 6. 它的掩码语言在 属性的文档中进行了介绍。Its masking language is described in the documentation for the property. 类涉及以下三个不同的字符串。The following three distinct strings are involved with the class. |字符串名称String name|说明Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |输入字符或字符串Input character or string|表示用作应用掩码的输入的字符。Represents the characters used as input that the mask is applied against. 在实际情况下，输入字符串可能由多个输入操作组成，其中包括 、、和 。In actuality, the input string may be composed of multiple input operations, including , , , and . 因此，不能直接访问输入字符串。Therefore, the input string cannot be accessed directly. 但是，通过 和 、和 属性提供输入字符串处理的各个方面。However, aspects of the input string handling are available though the and , , and properties.| |掩码Mask|表示用于将输入字符串转换为带格式字符串的输入格式掩码。Represents the input formatting mask used to transform the input string into the formatted string. 此字符串在 中设置，主要通过 属性进行访问。This string is set in the and accessed primarily though the property. 还可以通过其他成员（例如 、和 属性）使用掩码的特征。Characteristics of the mask are also available through other members, such as the , , and properties.| |格式化字符串Formatted string|表示在将完整的掩码应用于输入字符串时所产生的字符串。Represents the string that results when the full mask is applied to the input string. 可以通过类的多个成员查询带格式的字符串，包括 、、、、、等。The formatted string can be queried with many members of the class, including , , , , , , and so on. 带格式字符串的完整值可从 和 方法中获取。The full value of the formatted string is available from the and methods.| > [!NOTE] > 输入字符串可以表示直接用户输入（如 的情况），也可以由不与用户输入/输出操作直接关联的其他进程生成。The input string may represent direct user input, as in the case of the , or may be generated by other processes not directly associated with user input/output operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数表示最常见的重载形式。This constructor represents the most general overloaded form. `mask` 参数必须符合 类定义的掩码语言，该语言在 类的 属性中详细说明。The `mask` parameter must conform to the masking language defined by the class, which is detailed in the property of the class. 由于不能查询非特定区域性的信息，因此 构造函数将使用 方法来搜索第一个非特定区域性，以确定正确的分隔符。Because neutral cultures cannot be queried for culture-specific information, the constructor will use the method to search for the first non-neutral culture to use to determine the proper separator characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将 `input` 字符值添加到带格式字符串中的第一个可用位置，该位置位于上次赋值后的位置，该位置由 属性表示。The method adds the `input` character value to the first available position in the formatted string after the position that was last assigned, which is represented by the property. 此方法会因以下任何原因而失败：This method will fail for any of the following reasons: - 输入值 `input`不可打印，或者与它的对应掩码元素不匹配。The input value, `input`, is not printable, or it does not match its corresponding mask element. - 带格式的字符串中有零个可用的编辑位置，或在上一个赋值位置之后没有可用的编辑位置。There are zero available edit positions in the formatted string, or there are no available edit positions after the last assigned position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将 `input` 字符串中的字符添加到带格式的字符串，从 后的第一个可用位置开始。The method adds the characters from the `input` string to the formatted string, starting with the first available position after . 此方法会因以下任何原因而失败：This method will fail for any of the following reasons: - 输入值中的任何字符（`input`）不可打印，或者输入值与其对应的掩码元素不匹配。Any of the characters in the input value, `input`, are not printable, or the input value does not match its corresponding mask element. - 在上一个赋值位置之后，带格式的字符串中没有足够的可用编辑位置。There are not enough available edit positions in the formatted string after the last assigned position. 如果此方法失败，则不会进行任何添加，并且方法将返回 `false`。If this method fails, no additions are made and the method returns `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式化字符串由来自掩码的可编辑字符和文本组成。The formatted string is composed of editable characters and literals copied from the mask. 可编辑字符位置将由从掩码中复制的提示字符（如果未分配）占用，如果已分配有输入字符，则使用有效的输入字符。The editable character positions will either be occupied by the prompt character copied from the mask if they are unassigned, or with a valid input character if they have been assigned an input. 方法用于在指定的位置和搜索方向搜索指定的第一个字符。The method is used to search for the first assigned character after a specified position and search direction. 然后，可以将结果作为参数传递到 索引器，以在此位置获取指定的值。The result can subsequently be passed as a parameter to the indexer to obtain the assigned value at this position. 和 方法是此方法的补充。The and methods are complements of this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会将一个字符插入到 `pos` 参数指定的位置或之后的第一个编辑位置。The method inserts a character into the first edit position at or beyond that specified by the `pos` parameter. 此方法会将插入点后面的所有现有字符移动一个位置，以便为插入的 `input` 字符腾出空间。This method will shift all existing characters after the insertion point over by one position to make room for the inserted `input` character. 如果出现以下错误之一，则不会执行插入操作，并且方法将返回 `false`。If one of the following errors occurs, the insertion is not performed, and the method returns `false`. - `pos` 参数小于零或大于带格式字符串的 。The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the formatted string. - 在指定位置或指定位置之外的格式化字符串中找不到可编辑字符，`pos`。An editable character was not found in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`. - 插入字符 `input`不是有效的输入字符，因为它不可打印或与其相应的掩码元素不匹配。The insertion character, `input`, is not a valid input character because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element. - 插入点右侧没有可用位置，因此无法移动现有字符。There are no available positions to the right of the insertion point, so that existing characters cannot be shifted. - 移位现有字符将产生掩码冲突。Shifting the existing characters would produce a violation of the mask. 空 `input` 字符串将导致带格式的字符串不会发生更改，但会返回 `true`。An empty `input` string will cause no change in the formatted string, but will return `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将 `input` 字符串中的每个字符插入到位于 `pos` 和更高位置的编辑位置。The method inserts each character from the `input` string into the edit positions located at position `pos` and beyond. 此方法会将插入点后面的所有现有字符移动到每个插入字符的一个位置。This method will shift all existing characters after the insertion point over by one position for each inserted character. 如果出现以下错误之一，则不会执行插入操作，并且方法将返回 `false`。If one of the following errors occurs, no insertion is performed, and the method returns `false`. - `pos` 参数小于零或大于带格式字符串的 。The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the formatted string. - 在指定位置或指定位置之外的格式化字符串中不存在足够的可编辑字符 `pos`，以插入 `input` 字符串中的所有字符。Not enough editable characters exist in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`, to insert all of the characters from the `input` string. - 一个或多个插入字符不是有效的输入字符，因为它们不可打印或与其相应的掩码元素不匹配。One or more of the insertion characters are not a valid input character because they are not printable or do not match their corresponding mask element. - 插入点右侧没有足够的可用位置，因此无法移动现有字符。There are not enough available positions to the right of the insertion point, so that existing characters cannot be shifted. - 移位现有字符将产生掩码冲突。Shifting the existing characters would produce a violation of the mask. 请注意，在插入每个单独的字符时，会发生此变化。Note that this shifting occurs during the insertion of each individual character. 空 `input` 字符串将导致带格式的字符串不会发生更改，但会返回 `true`。An empty `input` string will cause no change in the formatted string, but will return `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在格式字符串中的指定位置或指定位置之外搜索第一个可编辑位置，`pos`。The method searches for the first editable position in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`. 如果找到一个，则可编辑位置的值将更改为指定字符，`input`。If one is found, the value of the editable position is changed to the specified character, `input`. 以下任何条件都将导致错误，导致不执行任何替换并返回 `false` 值：Any of the following conditions will result in an error that causes no replacement to be performed and a value of `false` to be returned: - `pos` 参数小于零或大于带格式字符串的 。The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the formatted string. - 在指定位置或指定位置之外的格式化字符串中找不到可编辑字符，`pos`。An editable character was not found in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`. - 替换字符 `input`不是有效的输入字符，因为它不可打印或与其相应的掩码元素不匹配。The replacement character, `input`, is not a valid input character because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在格式字符串中的指定位置或指定位置之外搜索第一个可编辑位置，`pos`。The method searches for the first editable position in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`. 如果找到一个，则可编辑位置的值将更改为指定字符，`input`。If one is found, the value of the editable position is changed to the specified character, `input`. 以下任何条件都将导致错误条件，导致不执行任何替换并返回 `false` 值：Any of the following conditions will result in an error condition that causes no replacement to be performed and a value of `false` to be returned: - `pos` 参数小于零或大于带格式字符串的 。The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the formatted string. - 在指定位置或指定位置之外的格式化字符串中找不到可编辑字符，`pos`。An editable character was not found in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`. - 替换字符 `input`不是有效的输入字符，因为它不可打印或与其相应的掩码元素不匹配。The replacement character, `input`, is not a valid input character because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element. 除了返回值，此方法还提供两个输出参数以提供有关替换操作的其他信息。In addition to the return value, this method has two output parameters to supply additional information about the replacement operation.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定应如何处理与提示字符匹配的输入字符。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how an input character that matches the prompt character should be handled.

value.span: 如果输入的提示字符会导致掩码中的当前可编辑位置被重置，则为 ；否则为 ，以指示要将提示字符作为正常输入字符进行处理。

span.span: if the prompt character entered as input causes the current editable position in the mask to be reset; otherwise, to indicate that the prompt character is to be processed as a normal input character.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过一种特殊方式处理两类字符节奏和提示字符。 can treat two categories of characters, paces and prompt characters, in a special manner. 通常，每个输入字符都将针对掩码进行测试，并接受或拒绝。Normally, each input character will be tested against the mask and either accepted or rejected. 如果将 属性设置为除 `null`以外的值，则对其进行操作，然后将 属性设置为 `true` 将导致提示字符进行特殊处理。Operating on the assumption that the property is set to a value other than `null`, then setting the property to `true` will result in special processing for the prompt character. 添加提示字符后，会使当前掩码字符位置被清除，当前位置前进到下一个可编辑字符。When a prompt character is added, it causes the current mask character position to be cleared and the current position to be advanced to the next editable character. 优先于 属性，如下表所述。 takes precedence over the property as described in the following table. |||产生的行为Resulting behavior| |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------| |`true`|`true`|可以添加提示字符，这会导致重置当前掩码位置。The prompt character can be added and it causes the current mask position to be reset. 默认值。The default.| |`true`|`false`|可以添加提示字符，这会导致重置当前掩码位置。The prompt character can be added and it causes the current mask position to be reset.| |`false`|`true`|将提示字符作为正常输入字符进行处理。The prompt character is processed as a normal input character.| |`false`|`false`|Prompt 字符无效，尝试添加字符的方法将失败。The prompt character is not valid and methods attempting to add the character will fail.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过一种特殊方式处理两类字符、空格和提示字符。 can treat two categories of characters, spaces and prompt characters, in a special manner. 通常，每个输入字符都将针对掩码进行测试，并接受或拒绝。Normally, each input character will be tested against the mask and either accepted or rejected. 将 属性设置为 "`true` 将导致清除当前掩码字符位置，并使当前位置前进到下一个可编辑字符。Setting the property to `true` will result in the current mask character position being cleared and the current position being advanced to the next editable character. 当分配保存的文本不包括提示时， 会很有用，其中，提示将被替换为空格。 is useful when assigning text that was saved excluding the prompt, where the prompt is replaced with a space. 在还原此类字符串之前，将 设置为 `true` 将在输入字符串中由空格占用的位置重置提示字符。Before restoring such a string, setting to `true` will reset the prompt characters at the positions occupied by spaces in the input string.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示掩码中的原义字符位置是否可由其相同的值覆盖。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether literal character positions in the mask can be overwritten by their same values.

value.span: 如果允许往回添加原义字符，则为 ；如果不允许用户覆盖原义字符，则为 。

span.span: to allow literals to be added back; otherwise, to not allow the user to overwrite literal characters.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入掩码可以包含文本和可编辑字符。Input masks can contain literal and editable characters. 如果尝试将输入字符添加到文本所占用掩码中的位置，则 属性的值将确定结果。If an attempt is made to add an input character to the position in a mask occupied by a literal, the value of the property determines the result. - 如果 `true`此属性，则在添加输入字符时覆盖具有相同值的文本是有效的。If this property is `true`, it is valid to overwrite a literal with the same value when adding input characters. 例如，可将正斜杠字符值 `'/'`添加到掩码的第三个位置 `"00/00/000"`。For example, a forward slash character value, `'/'`, could be added to the third position of the mask `"00/00/000"`. - 如果 `false`此属性，则将任何值分配给文本字符占用的掩码位置是无效的。If this property is `false`, it is not valid to assign any value to a mask position occupied by a literal character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的重载 方法返回带格式字符串的子字符串，从 `startPos` 位置开始，包括 `length` 参数指定的后续字符数。This version of the overloaded method returns a substring of the formatted string, starting at the position `startPos` and including the subsequent number of characters specified by the `length` parameter. 返回的字符串分别包括 和 属性的当前值的提示和文本。The returned string includes prompts and literals according to the current values of the and properties, respectively. 返回字符串将包含原始输入字符; 属性始终被忽略。The return string will contain the original input characters; the property is always ignored. > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于此方法会在用户界面中显示通常由密码字符保护的信息，因此，使用该方法时应特别小心，以免意外泄露敏感用户数据。Because this method reveals information that is usually protected in the user interface by password characters, it should be used with extreme caution to avoid accidentally revealing sensitive user data. 在输入参数中存在差异时执行以下操作： performs the following actions when there are discrepancies in the input parameters: - 如果 `startPos` 小于零，则起始位置设置为零。If `startPos` is less than zero, the starting position is set to zero. - 如果 `startPos` 大于或等于带格式字符串的实际 ，则返回 字符串。If `startPos` is greater than or equal to the actual of the formatted string, the string is returned. - 如果 `length` 大于开头位置之后的剩余字符数，则仅返回剩余的字符。If `length` is greater than the remaining number of characters past the starting position, only the remaining characters are returned. - 如果 `length` 小于或等于零，则返回 字符串。If `length` is less than or equal to zero, the string is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果字符是有效的输入，但未分配给带格式的字符串中的位置，则会被称为*转义*字符。A character is said to be *escaped* if it is valid input, but is not assigned to that position in the formatted string. 转义字符分为以下三个类别：Escaped characters fall into the following three categories: - 如果 `true` 属性，则会转义提示字符。Prompt characters are escaped if the property is `true`. - 如果输入字符与掩码中的文本具有相同的值，并且如果 `true` 属性，则这些字符将进行转义。Input characters are escaped if they have the same value as the literal in the mask, and if the property is `true`. - 如果 `true` 属性，则会转义空格字符。Space characters are escaped if the property is `true`. 如果 `pos` 参数小于零或大于 的 ，则 方法也会返回 `false`。The method will also return `false` if the `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 `input` 字符串应用于掩码，而不实际更改带格式的字符串，以测试 `input` 是否在相应的 操作中有效。The applies the `input` string against the mask, without actually changing the formatted string, to test whether `input` would be valid in a corresponding operation. 如果输入 `null` 或长度为零，此方法也会返回 `true`。This method also returns `true` if input is `null` or has zero length. 此版本的 提供了两个附加的输出参数，用于传递有关方法操作的详细信息。This version of provides two additional output parameters to convey more information about the operation of the method.
